data.name: Three Fourths Home: Extended Edition - Art Book & Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Deluxe Version content for Three Fourths Home: Extended Edition includes an art and commentary book as well as a DRM-Free copy of the game's soundtrack.

Art Book


Three Fourths Home: Extended Edition - Art and Commentary is a 235-page eBook put together by Zach Sanford, the writer and designer for the game. It presents high-resolution game assets, promotional materials, "behind-the-scenes" images, and notes from throughout the game's development. It also includes commentary on the game's design and narrative.

Soundtrack


A high-quality, DRM-Free copy of the game's soundtrack.

data.short_description: Includes a copy of Three Fourth Home's soundtrack and a 235-page book with art and commentary from the developer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or Newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9-Capable Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Art Book Requires a PDF-Reader

  • Processor: 1.6 GHz

  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Art Book Requires a PDF-Reader
